overview: The Cuban documentary Monta침a de Luz-produced by ICAIC (Instituto Cubano del Arte e Industria Cinematogr치ficos)-follows Cuban doctors working in collaboration with the communities throughout Latin America and Africa.The doctors work for no pay in areas of the world where there is either no medical care available or where the few local doctors are unable to meet the enomorus need, such as the AIDS epidemic in Namibia and flood victims in Haiti.
title: Monta침a de luz
